regen.absent_element: Driver notification and correction protocol activation for inaccurate data
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the driver of any discrepancies in train data post-entry and enable a protocol for correction before confirming the data for train movement.

regen.absent_element: condition of consultation when not stationary
regen.new_specification: The driver shall be able to consult train data anytime, even when the train is in motion.

regen.absent_element: consult train data at any time
regen.new_specification: The driver shall be able to consult train data at any time, whether the train is stationary or in motion.

label: The driver shall be able to consult train data when the train is stationary or moving.
absence: action of consulting train data when moving
